name: DEUTSCHE BANK NATIONAL TRUST COMPANY as Trustee v. Peta-gaye S. WHITBOURNE, Widow, Heirs, Beneficiary, et al.
name_abbreviation: Deutsche Bank Nat'l Trust Co. v. Whitbourne

parties:
DEUTSCHE BANK NATIONAL TRUST COMPANY as Trustee
v.
Peta-gaye S. WHITBOURNE, Widow, Heirs, Beneficiary, et al.
attorneys: The petition by the defendants Shakir Ade Bey and Wayne Antho Deroy for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 39353) is denied.
casebody.head_matter:
DEUTSCHE BANK NATIONAL TRUST COMPANY as Trustee
v.
Peta-gaye S. WHITBOURNE, Widow, Heirs, Beneficiary, et al.
Supreme Court of Connecticut.
Decided October 25, 2016
Shakir Ade Bey, self-represented, and Wayne Antho Deroy, self-represented, in support of the petition.
David M. Bizar, in opposition.
The petition by the defendants Shakir Ade Bey and Wayne Antho Deroy for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 39353) is denied.
